content.p: The University of Nottingham Malaysia's Faculty of Science and Engineering (FOSE) is dedicated to delivering an outstanding educational experience to our students while also providing creative and innovative solutions to problems faced by the industry and the community. The faculty is supported by approximately 175 academic and 50 professional staff with the aim to provide a world-class education with an international learning experience for its students. At UNM, we believe that students are at the heart of everything we do, and we embrace a student-centred approach. We pride ourselves in innovative teaching methods and a commitment to cutting-edge, world-class research. Each school offers exceptional opportunities for undergraduates, postgraduates, and researchers. All our programmes are taught in English and the degrees awarded are the same as those in the UK. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
